name: PervasiveDevelopmentalDisorder
title: Pervasive Developmental Disorder
description: This value set should not  be under the NCQA Phemur contract. We need to request a steward for this value set
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  an autistic disorder, other childhood disintegrative disorder, or other pervasive developmental disorder.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of autistic disorder, other childhood disintegrative disorders, or other pervasive developmental disorders.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
